Text: Ootko perkelees valmiiks saanu jo? Etkรถs viittis seedaa!!!
IPAP get your ass in here and SEED, damn it.

"great game", my ass.
Do NOT download this crap.
You can download it for free from their website anyway.

BUT DON'T GET IT .

First and foremost, if you pay to play, and you are asian, icelandic or australian, YOU CANNOT. There are no servers there, thus you wasted money. They do NOT tell anyone that, ANYWHERE.

Second. They STILL Randomly ban ANYONE they want. I lost 74 accounts to these motherf*ckers in HALF A YEAR. And I haven't hacked, abused, been racial or anything, they just simply ban you. You suddenly can't log in and wonder why.

If you mention it or ask why, they laugh at you and ban your new accounts. This game is f*cked up by K2 network. they ruined a perfectly good game. I bet that age old bugs are still present in the game as well. SIMPLE THINGS which they DIDN'T FIX, or CAN'T FIX, like lag-invisibility, grenade nuking ...no...don't get this cr*p.
